metadata.title: Bilibili Audio Extractor - Easily Extract MP3 Audio from Bilibili Videos
metadata.description: Free online Bilibili audio download tool. Input Bilibili video links to extract and download high-quality MP3 audio files with one click. Supports BV and AV numbers.
metadata.keywords: Bilibili audio download,Bilibili audio extraction,Bilibili to MP3,BV to MP3,bilibili audio extractor,video to audio,Bilibili downloader
metadata.ogTitle: Bilibili Audio Downloader - Easily Extract MP3 Audio from Bilibili Videos
metadata.ogDescription: Free online Bilibili audio download tool. Input Bilibili video links to extract and download high-quality MP3 audio files with one click.

main.title: Bilibili Audio Download
main.subtitle: Download history is saved locally in your browser, no information is retained on the server.
